question: Kevin is a marketing intern at a large corporation. They are tasked with presenting a price for a new service the company will be offering. Which of the following would you recommend Kevin do first?

answers.text: Analyze the critical Cs of pricing

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: That’s not correct. Asking their friends what a fair price would be will not yield appropriate data that Kevin needs for determining pricing.
That’s not correct. Creating an advertisement for the new service should be done well after pricing is determined.
That’s not correct. Choosing a pricing strategy should not be done before analyzing the critical Cs of pricing.

answers.text: Ask his friends what price they would be willing to pay

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: Analyzing the critical Cs of pricing will help ensure the pricing strategies are set appropriately.

detailedSolution: Analyzing the critical Cs of pricing will help ensure the pricing strategies are set appropriately.
